remarks: Express our constructed orthocomplement (polarity) in terms of the Hilbert space definition of orthocomplement.  Lines 24 and 25 in [Holland95] p. 14.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hdmapoc.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmapoc.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapoc.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmapoc.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hdmapoc.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
hdmapoc.o $e |- O = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapoc.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapoc.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmapoc.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ V ) $.
hdmapoc $p |- ( ph -> ( O ` X ) = { y e. V | A. z e. X ( ( S ` z ) ` y ) = .0. } ) $.
$d O y z $.
$d V z $.
$d X y z $.
$d ph y z $.
